review: My picks fall out way too easy while i'm playing live
Clear amazing cable VERY UNDERRATED incredibly cheap and amazing sound quality overall

Very clean very bright strings i use these on my strat and it feels good and sounds amazing. if you want to use these strings for distortion you're an idiot these are something i could imagine david gilmore using
Sound 95% like the boss mt-2 just not as clear as boss pedal. Sounds like it belongs to 80's trash metal didn't really do me to good with modern death or thrash metal
It's obviously modeling the boss super chorus but still sounds almost as good just not as clear
Very cheap and great for price but recording with this isn't the best idea. good for live performance on a budget
Cheap stands get the job done i have 0 problems so far. I've taken them from new jersey to south carolina
An amazing cheap solution but the dunlop strap pins are the best way to go overall but i defiantly trust these on my guitar. 2 months and no problems yet
The best strings i've ever had so far miles above ernie ball strings
I got an ernie ball strap instead of a planet waves strap
Holds my picks but if i move it to another part of my guitar it tends to have trouble sticking unless i force it on the guitar
